Class FactoryMethodIF

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--FactoryMethodIF
Direct Known Subclasses:
FactoryMethodEconomy
public abstract class FactoryMethodIF
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract class to create a user based on the Factory Method pattern. Account and security manager are implemented by concrete classes.

See Also:
package account.
